sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react" import db from "../../firebase/firebase" import firebase from "firebase" export const Excel = (props) => { const [profesionales, setProfesionales] = useState([]) const [titulo, setTitulo] = useState("") const ref = useRef(props.titulo) const current = ref.current useEffect(async () => { await db.collection("profesionales").onSnapshot(querySnapshot => { const data = [] querySnapshot.docs.forEach(doc => { const { name, ...rest } = doc.data() data.push({ id: doc.id, name, rest }) }) setProfesionales(data) }) }, []) useEffect(() => { setTitulo(props.titulo) }, [props.titulo]) const saveData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await profesionales.map(item => { const { monto, iibb, circ, circalq, bco, subtotal, total, name } = item db.collection("profesionales").doc(item.id).set( { [ref.current]: { title: titulo, monto: monto || 0, iibb: iibb || 0, circ: circ || 0, circalq: circalq || 0, bco: bco || 0, subtotal: subtotal || 0, total: total || 0, } }, { merge: true }) }) } const conseguirPorcentaje = (num, porcentaje) => { return Math.round((porcentaje * num) / 100) } const circalq = (value, id) => { const prof = [...profesionales] const foundIndex = profesionales.findIndex(item => item.id === id) const obj = profesionales[foundIndex] obj.circalq = value obj.subtotal = obj.monto - obj.iibb - obj.circ - (obj.circalq || 0) obj.bco = (conseguirPorcentaje((+obj.subtotal + +obj.monto), 1.2)) + 40 obj.total = obj.subtotal - obj.bco prof[foundIndex] = obj setProfesionales(prof) } const guardarMontos = (value, id) => { const prof = [...profesionales] const foundIndex = profesionales.findIndex(item => item.id === id) const obj = profesionales[foundIndex] obj.monto = +value obj.iibb = conseguirPorcentaje(value, 3.5) obj.circ = conseguirPorcentaje(value, 5) obj.subtotal = obj.monto - obj.iibb - obj.circ - (obj.circalq || 0) obj.bco = (conseguirPorcentaje((+obj.subtotal + +obj.monto), 1.2)) + 40 obj.total = obj.subtotal - obj.bco prof[foundIndex] = obj setProfesionales(prof) } const titulos = ["MONTO", "IIBB", "%CIRC", "CIRC/ALQ", "SUBTOTAL", "BCO", "TOTAL", "", "", "", "", "", ""] return
{titulos.map(item =>
{item}
)}
{profesionales.map(item =>
{console.log(item[JSON.stringify(current)])}
{item.name}
guardarMontos(e.target.value, item.id)} />
circalq(e.target.value, item.id)} />
)}
}
